entry.title: An Exciting Way to Get Involved | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: An Exciting Way to Get Involved | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 10 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 10 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “An Exciting Way to Get Involved” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Gen. 1:1, 2, 26; Exod. 18:21–25;1 Cor. 12:12–25; Acts 16:11–15, 40; Acts 4:31; Acts 12:12
Memory Text: “Then He said to His disciples, ‘The harvest truly is plentiful, but the laborers are few. Therefore pray the Lord of the harvest to send out laborers into His harvest’ ” (Matthew 9:37, 38, NKJV).
(August 29 - September 4, 2020)
Sunday (Jill Morikone) “Small Groups: God’s Idea First” Monday (Kenny Shelton) “Small Groups in Scripture” Tuesday (Ryan Day) “Organized for Service” Wednesday (John Dinzey) “New Testament Small Groups” Thursday (John Lomacang) “Small Group Dynamics”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_10.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

media:group.media:title: 7 Dangers of Legalism vs Grace (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Church sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. There seems to be a lot of confusion in the area of grace and legalism. For example, are we saved by works? If not what role do works play in the life of a christian? Where is the balance of trusting and believing in Jesus and rejecting the message of the Bible to walk as Jesus walked? The Bible teaches that we can have assurance of salvation and free of guilt. Join 3ABN Vice President/COO Jill Morikone as she opens the Bible to teach us about grace and legalism.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Developing a Winning Attitude | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 9 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Developing a Winning Attitude | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 9 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 9 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Developing a Winning Attitude” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: John 4:27–30, 39–42; Matt. 15:21–28; 2 Thess. 1:1–4; Rom. 15:7; Eph. 4:32; 1 Pet. 3:15
Memory Text: “But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts, and always be ready to give a defense to everyone who asks you a reason for the hope that is in you, with meekness and fear” (1 Peter 3:15, NKJV).
(August 22 - August 28, 2020)
Sunday (John Lomacang) “Receptivity to the Gospel” Monday (Ryan Day) “An Attitude Adjustment” Tuesday (John Dinzey) “Presenting the Truth in Love” Wednesday (Kenny Shelton) “The Foundation of Acceptance” Thursday (Jill Morikone) “Truth Lovingly Presented”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_09.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/

media:group.media:title: “Uplifting Christ in the Doctrines“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200034)
media:group.media:description:
Join Pastor John Lomacang and his guests David Klinedinst and Pastor Joseph Ikner here in the Studio. They will be sharing the many ways we can present the doctrines of the church and the truths of Scripture in a Christ-centered, positive, relational, and hope-filled way. David’s ministry Discover Bible prophecy is helping people experience deeper faith and hope for the future.
Learn more at: http://discoverbibleprophecy.org/

media:group.media:title: “Reaching the Amish Community" - 3ABN Today (TDY200036)
media:group.media:description:
Join us today as Andy & Naomi Weaver (previously Amish) and Gerry Wagoner (previously German Baptist) tell their testimony about how they became Seventh-day Adventists. Hosted by John Dinzey, Andy and Gerry will share how they are reaching the Amish community, Mennonites and others. You will enjoy listening to their testimonies and all the things their ministry, West Salem Mission, is doing to win souls for Christ.
Learn more at: https://www.westsalemmission.org/

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Who is Suppressing the Truth | 3ABN Worship Hour

media:group.media:title: Who is Suppressing the Truth | 3ABN Worship Hour
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Are you suppressing the Seventh-day Adventist truth? The Bible says to whom much is given much is required. Don't cover up the straight testimony of truth so preciously revealed to you by God otherwise you. We have far more to fear from within than from without. The hindrance to strength and success are far greater from the church itself than from the world. Join Pastor Kenny Shelton as he opens the Bible to teach us about Seventh-day Adventist revival and reformation.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
